# Github Contributions JSON API

A NextJS serverless API to get a user's Github contributions. Hosted on [now.sh](https://now.sh/). Faster than Heroku servers.

### Endpoint

https://github-contributions-json-api-9rbq4wpsw.now.sh/api

### Example Request

```sh
curl https://github-contributions-json-api-9rbq4wpsw.now.sh/api?username=gaearon
```
